body_html:
@SsnL Is it not forward-compatible as well? Can't 5.2-compiled code run on 6.1? (it seems it can't, but it's strange)

The reason I was putting it manually is #4716. I'm using a machine which also has a small desktop GPU with capability of 2.0, and compilation fails, since it tries to target it as well.

body:
@SsnL Is it not forward-compatible as well? Can't 5.2-compiled code run on 6.1? (it seems it can't, but it's strange)

The reason I was putting it manually is https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/4716. I'm using a machine which also has a small desktop GPU with capability of 2.0, and compilation fails, since it tries to target it as well.
